name: CIOOS Atlantic - ERDDAP Data Server
description: ERDDAP is a data server providing simple, consistent methods to download subsets of scientific datasets in common file formats and to create graphs and maps. ERDDAP hosts historic and real-time observations from the Atlantic Seaboard.
owner_subregion_name: Atlantic Provinces (Nova Scotia, New Brunswick, Newfoundland and Labrador, Prince Edward Island)
